sentence.Network_en: Where are you going in that rig-out?
sentence.Network_cn: 你穿着那身打扮要去哪里？

sentence.Network_en: The severe conditions hampered attempts to pull the vessel free of the rig.
sentence.Network_cn: 恶劣的天气情况使得把那艘船拉离钻塔的努力很难奏效。

sentence.Network_en: They had not found any evidence of a systematic attempt to rig the ballot.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们没有发现任何证据证明有人企图全面操纵投票。
